Do not impose this suspension. It is obsolete.

To prevent spam, new accounts used to be created with an "email suspension" which prevented them from chatting in any room or posting writeups, but not from sending messages. The suspension was lifted when they proved they had a valid email address. Since November 7, 2012 it has no longer been possible to log in to a new account at all without activating the account with a link sent by email, so this is no longer needed.
